trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que serializa uma instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> para e do formato RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 feeds.
trans-unit.target: Use esta classe para serializar instâncias do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> e para criar instâncias de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> de documentos XML que representam 2.0 RSS feeds.

trans-unit.source: If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> formatter.
trans-unit.target: Se uma classe de derivada <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> e para serializá-lo, use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> formatador.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and serialize it to RSS 2.0.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> e serializá-lo para RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance and read in an RSS syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> de instância e lido em um feed de distribuição do RSS.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como chamar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: A instância derivada de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> a ser serializada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to instantiate when a syndication feed is read in.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para especificar uma classe derivada de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instanciar quando um feed de distribuição é lida.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como usar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se elementos que são definidos na especificação do Atom 1.0, mas não na especificação do RSS 2.0, devem ou não ser serializados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with in the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se o `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parâmetro é `true`, todos os elementos definidos na especificação do Atom 1.0 que não estão definidos na especificação do RSS 2.0 são serializados com o namespace do Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como chamar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado contém um feed de sindicalização RSS 2.0 válido.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contém um feed de sindicalização RSS 2.0 válido.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância derivada de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> que está associada à instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância derivada de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> que está associada à instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define um valor que especifica se é necessário preservar extensões do atributo durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se deve ser preservar extensões de atributo durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão dessa propriedade é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: Extensões de atributo são os atributos XML que não estão definidos na especificação do RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade determina se deve gravar esses atributos durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, essa propriedade determina se devem ser preservados desconhecidos atributos dentro de `AttributeExtensions` propriedades na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instância ao desserializar 2.0 um RSS feed.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define um valor que especifica se é necessário preservar extensões do elemento durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se deve ser preservar extensões do elemento durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão dessa propriedade é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: Extensões de elemento são os elementos XML que não estão definidos na especificação do RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade determina se deve gravar esses elementos durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, essa propriedade determina se devem ser preservados elementos desconhecidos dentro de `ElementExtensions` propriedades na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instância ao desserializar 2.0 um RSS feed.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Reads an RSS 2.0 syndication feed from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lê um feed de sindicalização RSS 2.0 da instância de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> usado para criar a nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Reads a syndication item from <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance using the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lê um item de sindicalização da instância de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> usando a instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instância não é adicionada ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associados a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to use to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> a ser usada para criar as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether all of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances have been read from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se todas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> foram lidas da instância de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Lê uma coleção de instâncias de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> do <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de instâncias <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instances are not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instâncias não são adicionadas para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associados a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define um valor que especifica se as extensões devem ser serializadas dentro do namespace do Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se a serializar extensões dentro do namespace do Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão dessa propriedade é `true`.

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, any properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace otherwise these properties are not serialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é `true`, as propriedades na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> classe que não pode ser representado no formato RSS 2.0 são serializados dentro do namespace do Atom 1.0 caso contrário, essas propriedades não são serializadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: Define a instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> associada ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your own schema.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para retornar o seu próprio esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão de sindicalização usada pelo formatador.

trans-unit.source: The syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: A versão de distribuição usada pelo formatador.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] oferece suporte a versões de distribuição Atom 1.0 e RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> a gravar.

trans-unit.source: The base URI for the feed.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base para o feed.

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Grava a instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the way a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is written.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para alterar a forma como um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> é gravado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to write.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de instâncias de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> a gravar.

trans-unit.source: The base URI for the feed.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base para o feed.

trans-unit.source: Writes a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Grava um conjunto de instâncias de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the way a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para alterar a forma como uma coleção de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Grava o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a syndication feed and use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> to write the feed to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como criar um feed de distribuição e usar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> para gravar o feed para uma <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
